feed.title: ByteStash Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ByteStash: ByteStash v1.5.4
entry.content:
Key Changes

  • Added embeddable snippets
  • Fixed OIDC login under a base path
  • Added API keys and snippet pushing endpoint
  • Added support for markdown in descriptions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/compare/v1.5.3...v1.5.4

entry.title: New release for ByteStash: ByteStash v1.5.5
entry.content:
Key Changes

  • Fixed an issue with OIDC under no base path

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/compare/v1.5.4...v1.5.5

entry.title: New release for ByteStash: ByteStash v1.5.6
entry.content:
Key Changes

  • Escape key can now close any open modals
  • OIDC now prefers the users name over a substring of their email
  • The expansion state of modals is now persistent, if you expand a modal it will be remembered for the next time
  • The paths of assets are now altered when ByteStash is under a base path

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/compare/v1.5.5...v1.5.6

entry.title: New release for ByteStash: ByteStash v1.5.7
entry.content:
Key Changes

  • Fixed the app version number
  • Various Helm Chart features
  • Added pikapods.com install option
  • Clickable markdown links are now correctly coloured
  • Fixed missing settings when SnippetCards were small
  • Upped the node.js version to v22

New Contributors

  • @Trungtin1011 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/176
  • @krenax made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/178
  • @m3nu made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/compare/v1.5.6...v1.5.7

entry.title: New release for ByteStash: ByteStash v1.5.8
entry.content:
It's been a while, huh? I've been busy with life, and while I was gone some fantastic additions have been made by the community, and a few extra from myself today. Cheers to everyone for supporting and contributing to ByteStash. Legends!

Key Changes

  • [bug] fix a bug with OIDC on bare metal by @jordan-dalby in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/204
  • [feat] clear search result by @jordan-dalby in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/206
  • preferred_username considered first when generating usernames by @Falklian in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/211
  • add api_keys table creation to createInitialSchema by @Falklian in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/212
  • Refactor/init schema and update imports by @eddyseed in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/219
  • [feat] added get endpoint for retrieving snippets by @jordan-dalby in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/222
  • Add Swagger documentation by @LetsDrinkSomeTea in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/224
  • [181] Add raw access to snippets by @jordan-dalby in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/226
  • [175] Allow changing password if current password is known by @jordan-dalby in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/227

New Contributors

  • @Falklian made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/211
  • @eddyseed made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/219
  • @LetsDrinkSomeTea made their first contribution in https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/pull/224

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash/compare/v1.5.7...v1.5.8
